node._create_table_statement: CREATE TABLE `annotation` ( `annotation_id` int NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `ann_node` int NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `ann_text` mediumtext, `ann_location` char(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`annotation_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci
node.title: annotation
